name: Energy To Control
description:
Energy to control is a GMTK Game Jam submission.

Move the character by pressing "SPACE" which launches the character away from energy zones. You must get to the next energy zone so launch carefully.

The theme for GMTK Game Jam was "out of control". The theme is followed as the player can only be controlled inside energy zones, the player is "out of control" when not in these zones.

This game was made with Unity in 6 hrs by Shreyansh.
